title: Black screen for 2 to 3 secs then bounce out to bag report, please help!
body:
Hey Guys, been playing lol for 5 years now, never had this issue before, after camp select countdown it will go in to full screen black screen as if it's trying to load up then 2 to 3 sec later it will just crash back out to client screen with bug report popping up. it was still running fine before using the same laptop same windows 10 with no updates been done to anything at all! can someone please help?

Only thing that has changed is the monitor when form 1440p to 1080p because the big one broke

My specs Win 10 on on Alienware 17 on GTX980m 

Thanks

replies.body: It sucks that you other monitor broke, but changing it shouldn't cause any issues.  Actually, a resolution higher than 1080p is currently supported so it puts you in a better spot against visual problems.  Your issue specifically sounds like a bad driver or something else failing to render the game.  Go over each step of the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to fix this up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
